results.title: The Role of Glycogen Synthase Kinase-3beta in the Zinc-Mediated Neuroprotective Effect of Metformin in Rats with Glutamate Neurotoxicity.
results.text_hl: Forty adult male @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into 5 groups: control, @CHEMICAL_Glutamic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018698 @@@glutamate@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Glutamic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018698 @@@glutamate@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Zinc_Deficiency_Neonatal_due_to_Low_Breast_Milk_Zinc</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564286 @@@zinc deficiency@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Glutamic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018698 @@@glutamate@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Zinc_Deficiency_Neonatal_due_to_Low_Breast_Milk_Zinc</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564286 @@@zinc deficiency@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Glutamic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018698 @@@glutamate@@@.

citations.NLM: Oruc A, Oruc KY, Yanar K, Mengi M, Caglar A, Kurt BO, Altan M, Sonmez OF, Cakatay U, Uzun H, Simsek G. The Role of Glycogen Synthase Kinase-3beta in the Zinc-Mediated Neuroprotective Effect of Metformin in Rats with Glutamate Neurotoxicity. Biol Trace Elem Res. 2023 Apr 18;():. PMID: 37071257
